about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Amber of Jinn is a recurring nightmare you can’t escape from, a VR survival horror game developed by Stixor Technologies. Every night you must contend with spirits from pre-Islamic folklore without going mad in the process. Explore a liminal post-colonial maze and become a student of dream logic or perish before you wake up.

In a wilfully ignored part of South-Asia stands a once opulent haveli rumoured to be built by the persian descendants from the Court of Suleiman. Over the years the village surrounding it turned into a town and three children from that town went to explore the haveli. Two went missing and one went mute.

The distraught family moved and the town moved on; But for the lone survivour, who gets whisked away to the haveli every night in his sleep and is forced to deal with eldritch creatures whose stories have been suppressed by the dogmatic and the pious alike.

Amber of Jinn is a VR horror experience aimed to put you inside scary stories you heard as a child and asks the question: What will you do, when a fairytale is no longer fiction?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Oculus Quest 2, Ocululs Quest Pro, Oculus Quest 3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Oculus Quest 2, Ocululs Quest Pro, Oculus Quest 3
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
